Danas se obeležava Medjunarodni dan borbe protiv nekažnjivosti zločina nad novinarima

02 Nov 2019, 10:50

Ministarstvo kulture i informisanja Srbije saopštilo je danas da Medjunarodni dan borbe protiv nekažnjivosti zločina nad novinarima, koji se obeležava 2. novembra, treba da podseti celokupno društvo je potreban ozbiljniji pristup ovom problemu."Ministarstvo kulture i informisanja uvek i bez zadrške osudjuje svaki napad, pritisak, nasilje i svaki drugi način ugrožavanja bezbednosti predstavnika medija dok obavljaju svoje profesionalne dužnosti", piše u saopštenju.Iz ministarstva ističu da je kažnjavanje odgovornih najefikasniji oblik prevencije za stvaranje uslova za neometan rad svih medijskih radnika i dodaje da se "snažno" zalaže za unapredjenje slobode protoka informacija.Za to su neophodni odgovornost, objektivnost i profesionalnost svih učesnika u procesu javnog informisanja, kako novinara i medija, nosioca javnih funkcija, ali i svih gradjana Srbije, navode iz ministarstva.

Today marks the International Day Against Impunity for Crimes against Journalists

02 Nov 2019, 09:50

The Ministry of Culture and Information of Serbia announced today that International Day for the Impunity of Crimes against Journalists, which is celebrated on November 2, should remind the whole society that a more serious approach to this problem is needed. "The Ministry of Culture and Information condemns every attack without delay. press, violence and any other means of endangering the safety of media representatives while performing their professional duties, "the ministry said. Punishing those responsible is the most effective form of prevention to create conditions for the smooth operation of all media workers, and adds that it is" strongly "committed to Improving the freedom of information flow. This requires the responsibility, objectivity and professionalism of all participants in the process of public information, both journalists and media, holders of public office, but also all citizens of Serbia, the ministry said.
